title: System & Network Engineer
desc: Managing and optimizing corporate network infrastructure to ensure high availability and security. Implementing ITSM practices and internal automation initiatives.
highlights: Administering virtualized systems, VMware ESXi environments, and enterprise network infrastructure.
Diagnosing and resolving incidents to maintain service continuity across production systems.
Implementing ITSM workflows and documentation to improve operational efficiency.
Exploring automation and AI-driven solutions (Power BI, Python, internal tools) to modernize infrastructure monitoring and reporting.

title: Computer Science Student
desc: Learning foundational and core concepts in computer science, software development, and modern computing systems.
highlights: Studying core CS subjects such as data structures, algorithms, operating systems, and computer networks.
Learning software engineering principles, design patterns, and full-stack development basics.
Gaining hands-on experience with databases, distributed systems fundamentals, and system design concepts.
Exploring introductory AI, machine learning, and mathematical foundations for computing.
